    • Method Detail

      • begin

        public void begin()
        Description copied from interface: BaseProcessor
        This method will be called just before looping over the sequence of CDX lines. Intermediary processor must call begin() on nested processor.

      • writeHeader

        protected void writeHeader(org.archive.format.cdx.FieldSplitFormat names)

      • writeLine

        public int writeLine(org.archive.format.cdx.CDXLine line)
        Description copied from interface: BaseProcessor
        Process line.
        Parameters:
        line - CDXLine
        Returns:
        1 if line is sent to output, 0 otherwise.

      • end

        public void end()
        Description copied from interface: BaseProcessor
        Called at the end. Perform any clean ups / finalizations here. Intermediaries processor should call end() on nested processor.

      • writeResumeKey

        public void writeResumeKey(String resumeKey)
        Description copied from interface: BaseProcessor
        Write resumption key. Only the final CDXWriter should do actual work. All intermediaries shall simply call writeResumeKey(resumeKey) on nested processor.
